Asynchronous networking support is provided by AFNetworking, a networking library for iOS and Mac OS X. It is open source software, written by/copyright by Mattt Thompson and Scott Raymond (the extra 't' is intentional), and created in the development of Gowalla for iPhone. It is available at https://github.com/AFNetworking/AFNetworking.
This product makes use of certain Third Party software libraries, the licenses and copyright notices for which appear below:
